scRNAbaseR 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Normalize gene expression data

    normalize_data.Rd

    Applies log2 normalization to gene expression data based on gene counts and a scaling factor.

    normalize_data(data, type = "counts", factor = 1e+06)

    Arguments

    data

    A matrix or data frame of raw gene expression data.

    type

    A type of normalization based on number of positive expressed genes or total counts per cell / set. Default is 'counts'

    factor

    A numeric scaling factor for normalization. Default is 1,000,000.

    Value

    A normalized dataset with log2-transformed values.

    Examples

    normalized_data <- normalize_data(data)
#> Error in normalize_data(data): could not find function "normalize_data"
